comment.text: This translation key is used to display the account login type label in a filtering section, typically found on a contact list page. It will be displayed next to a button or dropdown option, allowing users to select their preferred login method. Translators should focus on adapting this text to fit various cultural contexts and user interfaces.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "Tipo de inicio de sesión de la cuenta" is a bit verbose and not the most natural phrasing in Spanish. A more common and concise translation would be "Tipo de inicio de sesión" or "Tipo de acceso a la cuenta".

The word 'ປະເພດ' is spelled correctly, but might benefit from a slightly more common or natural phrasing depending on the context. While technically correct, 'ຊະນິດ' could be a more widely understood alternative.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ປະເພດການເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບບັນຊີ can be considered, but 'ຊະນິດການເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບບັນຊີ' might be slightly better.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ການເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບບັນຊີ' is grammatically correct but could be slightly more concise depending on the target audience. 'ເຂົ້າລະບົບບັນຊີ' is a shorter, acceptable alternative, although it loses a bit of formality.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'ປະເພດການເຂົ້າລະບົບບັນຊີ' or 'ປະເພດເຂົ້າລະບົບບັນຊີ' for brevity.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'පිවිසෙන ගිණුමේ වර්ගය' is understandable, it's a slightly literal translation. A more natural and accurate translation of 'Account login type' would be something along the lines of 'ගිණුම ඇතුළත් කිරීමේ පදය වර්ගය' or 'ගිණුම ල໊ගින් කිරීමේ පදය'.
While technically correct, 'Typ prihlásenia na účet' is a bit literal and slightly awkward. A more natural Slovak phrasing would be 'Typ prihlásenia' or 'Prihlásenie na účet'.

The translation 'Тип пријаве на налог' while understandable, isn't the most natural or precise translation of 'Account login type'. 'Prijava' is generally used for logging *in* to something, not the *type* of login. A better translation would focus on the 'type' aspect.  A more accurate translation might be 'Врста пријаве на рачун' or 'Тип уласка у налог'.

The translation "Tip prijave na nalog" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "Account login type." While technically correct, it's a bit clunky. A more natural phrasing would be "Vrsta prijave na nalog" or "Način prijave na nalog".
